name: pyRouterJig
tagline: pyRouterJig is a woodworking layout tool for creating box and dovetail joints
body:
### Welcome to pyRouterJig.

pyRouterJig is a woodworking layout tool for creating box and dovetail
joints.  It has the following features:
* Creates templates for the [Incra LS Positioner fence](http://www.incra.com/router_table_fences-ls_positiners.html).  In fact, this was the original motivation for writing pyRouterJig.
* Support for both English and metric unit systems.  Currently, only English units have been tested, in part because my LS Positioner is the English version. 
* May be customized for any finger (box joint) or pin / tail (dovetail) spacing pattern.  Currently, two patterns are included ("Equally spaced" and "Variable spaced"), which will be described below.
* pyRouterJog is licensed under the GPL, so that you're free to use and modify it.

[[Installation|installation-ref]]

### Authors and Contributors
Robert B. Lowrie (@lowrie)

### Support or Contact
